caption.p: ( a) DPPH and ( b) ABTS radical scavenging capacity of cold-pressed pomegranate seed oil (PSO) from unpretreated, blanched (95 ± 2 °C/3 min), and microwave-heated (261 W for 102 s) seeds. Columns followed by different letters are significantly different ( p < 0.05) according to Duncan’s multiple range test. Vertical bars indicate the standard deviation of the mean.
